question_text_en: What is the previous activity involving an agent that eats an object whose type is Cupcake in the living room from 2024-06-12T21:04:00 to 2024-07-01T10:05:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:eat .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-12T21:04:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-07-01T10:05:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Cupcake .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        
                    ?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    ?answer vh2kg:nextActivity ?activity .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Cupcake
qualifiers_en.question: What is the previous activity?

question_text_en: What is the activity involving an agent that texts an object whose attribute is has_plug at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -5.62 after or at 2024-05-03T14:20:00 and before 2024-05-09T02:21:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-03T14:20:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-05-09T02:21:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_plug .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-5.62"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        ?answer vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -5.62
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose attribute is has_plug
qualifiers_en.question: What is the activity?

question_text_en: What is the next activity involving an agent that wipes an object whose height is greater than 0.17m in the bedroom for more than or equal to 6 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 6)
            
                        } }
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y > 0.17)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                        
                    ?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    ?activity vh2kg:nextActivity ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: more than or equal to 6 seconds
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose height is greater than 0.17m
qualifiers_en.question: What is the next activity?

question_text_en: What is the activity involving an agent that closes an object which is a subclass of Appliances in the kitchen for less than 18 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:close .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration < 18)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Appliances .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        ?answer vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Appliances
qualifiers_en.question: What is the activity?

question_text_en: What is the previous activity involving an agent that wipes an object which is a subclass of Props in the kitchen after 2024-05-03T00:29:00 and before or at 2024-06-27T19:29:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:wipe .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-03T00:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-06-27T19:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                    ?activity vh2kg:hasEvent ?event .
                    ?answer vh2kg:nextActivity ?activity .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Props
qualifiers_en.question: What is the previous activity?
